channel.title: Issue with mopar client
channel.description: Hi. I am having some trouble with the moparscape client. Here is the error: [code] # # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # SIGSEGV (0xb) at pc=0x00007f4500d9eda9, pid=15096, tid=139933674362640 # # JRE version: 6.0_18-b07 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (16.0-b13 mixed mode linux-amd64 ) # Problematic frame: # V [libjvm.so+0x1dcda9] # # An error report file with more information is saved as: # /home/dragos/MoparScape/hs_err_pid15096.log # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp # Aborted [/code]

item.title: Issue with mopar client
item.dc:creator: @the_pawesome_owner the pawesome owner
item.description:
@the_pawesome_owner wrote:

Hi. I am having some trouble with the moparscape client. Here is the error:

#
# A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
#
#  SIGSEGV (0xb) at pc=0x00007f4500d9eda9, pid=15096, tid=139933674362640
#
# JRE version: 6.0_18-b07
# Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (16.0-b13 mixed mode linux-amd64 )
# Problematic frame:
# V  [libjvm.so+0x1dcda9]
#
# An error report file with more information is saved as:
# /home/dragos/MoparScape/hs_err_pid15096.log
#
# If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit:
#   http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp
#
Aborted

Read full topic
